column2: "I was waiting for you, <%me>."
"Hah! How was that? I sounded just like Xion, right?"
"Well, I am an exact duplicate of her, so it's only natural that I sound just like her."
"Anyway, forget about all that formal stuff. I'll be relying on you a lot in the future, so I'd prefer it if we were on a more casual footing."
"Oh, right, the thing. The reason I called you here, the thing I could only tell you in person."
"It's about that girl... Matoi."
"To be honest, I have no clue who or what she is. There's no data about her anywhere."
"She has that much power... and yet there aren't any records of her existence. It's very strange."
"She's not in the ARKS database or in Xion's records. It's like she just doesn't exist. Almost as if she was intentionally kept hidden."

"At first, I thought it must have been Luther who erased her, but...
Even he didn't know about her."
"Which leaves only one person who'd be capable of this..."
"That's right. Xion. Xion erased all data relating to Matoi."
"And that's not all that's missing. All data from about ten years ago, absolutely everything, has been wiped out."
"Not just the data on our systems, either. Even people's memories have been affected."
"There's nothing to salvage, nothing to follow up on, nothing to investigate. A total blank."
"Ten years ago... Something big must have happened back then, to have been wiped from everyone's memories. But we can't trace deleted records..."
"In that case, our only option is to go there and investigate in person."
"<%me>, you should be able to do that."
"I'm not just saying all this out of curiosity, either."
"Xion is gone, and Luther has been destroyed. From now on, ARKS is going to have to make some big changes."
"In other words, I'll have to take on all the control Luther had, while also performing all the calculations Xion did."
"If I'm going to be responsible for the new ARKS, I'll need to learn as much as I can."
"No matter how bad it turns out to be."
"That said, it's true that I'm curious. I want to know about everything that happened before I was born, and I want to learn more about myself."
"So, I'll leave it up to you to decide what we do from now on. I think it's better if someone who doesn't know everything leads the way."
"Still, if there's anything I can help you with, feel free to ask me any time. You can always find me here."
